DLG f

DLG 0
"""
Bleek:
"It's freezing polar bear nuts out that mf"

... that's not Ricky Bobby
I better keep looking
"""
NAME bleek dialog

DLG 1
"""
Hannah:
"So I'm sitting there with my whole hand up his ass"

... wtf

"Oh hey! Yeah I know Ricky Bobby, he's a regular. I don't see him though. He might be getting a drink"
"""
NAME Hannah dialog

DLG 2
"""
Yaliel:
"What if we go in shark cages and wrap meat around our dicks and whoever's dick gets eaten first loses and loser has to get a surgical vagina. And then we all fuck the loser."

... 

I don't even....
"""
NAME Yaliel dialog

DLG 3
"""
Callise:
"I actually love eating corn because I love seeing little corn pieces in my shit"

... ok gross but Ricky Bobby is probably not in here since this is the ladies room
"""
